channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: Ship Captain and Crew Face Attempted Murder Charges Over Human Smuggling Case
item.description: After 16 Vietnamese nationals were found in the hull of a cargo boat last year, the ship's captain and three crew members are now facing attempted murder charges.

item.title: Rescuers Step Up Search for People Missing in Hualien Earthquake
item.description: Rescuers are still looking for three people missing after last week's Hualien earthquake.

item.title: Taiwan Signs US$250M Deal With U.S. To Maintain Military Communications System
item.description: Taiwan and the U.S. have signed a US$250 million deal which will see the U.S. maintain one of Taiwan's military communication systems through 2028.

item.title: Taiwan Reveals Five New Cabinet Ministers for Incoming Administration
item.description: Taiwan's incoming Lai Ching-te administration has revealed its picks for interior, transportation, justice, education and culture ministers.
